attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yorkshire TV has spawned the likes of Rising Damp, Frost, Heartbeat, Emmerdale and The Royal, to name but a few.
Michael Grade has now announced the the majority of ITV's cutbacks will affect ITV Yorkshire over and above every other ITV region in the country.
OPPOSE MICHAEL GRADE AND MAKE A STAND! LOOK AT WHAT HE DID FOR THE BBC....NOTHING!

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
